title: Prediction of Sea Level Rise near Shanghai
abstract:
Firstly, by establishing a prediction model for global sea-level rise and
calculating with Maple, it is shown that the global sea-level rise rate in 2009
is 2.68 mm/a. The height and rate of global sea-level rise will be about 9.11
cm and 3.22 mm/a in 2020. Based on the study and the actual land subsidence in
Shanghai Lingang New City, the rate of relative sea-level rise near Lingang New
City is calculated to be 12.68 mm/a in 2009. Then, through setting up the
extrapolation prediction model with a linear trend term and a significant tidal
cycle, the rise rate of average sea-level near Lingang New City was predicted.
The result showed it will be 0.33 mm/a in 2020.
